rules: {% for rul in rules %}<option value='{% if rul.id != None %}{{rul.id}}{% endif %}'>{% if rul.name_rule_opt != None %} {{rul.name_rule_opt}} {% endif %}</option>{% endfor %}
healthcheck_list: {% for healthcheck in healthcheck_options_list %}<label for='id_healthcheck_type_{{healthcheck.index}}'><input type='radio' {% if healthcheck.checked %}checked='checked'{% endif %} id='id_healthcheck_type_{{healthcheck.index}}' value='{{healthcheck.name}}' name='healthcheck_type' />{{healthcheck.name}}</label>{% endfor %}
